posts.title: React
posts.body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces on the web

posts.title: React Native
posts.body: React Native is a cross-platform JavaScript-based framework for writing native iOS and Android mobile application code

posts.title: Angular
posts.body: Angular is a development platform, built on TypeScript

comments.text: I think that ReactJS is a very efficient development framework that can be used to help developers create faster web apps with powerful UI.
In terms of performance and output, there are no major disadvantages to using React versus another JavaScript framework.
Angular is best utilized for completing advanced, large-scale projects under the direction of a seasoned developer.
